column5: Treat yourself to this luxurious one bedroom guest suite (620sf) in the heart of Montrose. Located in a contemporary home designed by one of Houston's premier architects. Private elevator entrance and access to a sunroom and beautiful pool. It is close to the downtown, midtown, parks, art and culture, great restaurants and dining. Secure property with covered parking, CCTV, electronic access. Great corporate apartment with weekly housekeeping and in unit washer/dryer. .
